newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Chase HK branch launches HK$2.0 bln FRCD.
newsitem.headline: Chase HK branch launches HK$2.0 bln FRCD.

text.p: The following floating rate negotiable certificates of deposit issue was announced by lead manager Chase Manhattan Asia.
BORROWER CHASE MANHATTAN BANK ACTING THROUGH ITS HK BRANCH
AMOUNT HK$2.0 BLN COUPON 1MH+20BP MATURITY 3 YRS
TYPE FRCD ISS PRICE PAR RE-OFFER --
PUTS NONE CALLS NONE LAUNCH 12.JUN.97
LISTING NONE REPAYMENT BULLET REPLIES 12.JUN.97
RATING A1 EXPECTED SALES LMTS STANDARD DENOMS HK$1MLN
NEG PLG NO CRS DEF YES FORCE MAJ --
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY HK/US PAY DATE 08.JUL.97
TAX CALL YES SIGNING 03.JUL.97
LEAD MANAGER CHASE MANHATTAN ASIA
PAYING AGENT CHASE MANHATTAN BANK
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
CO-LEAD MANAGERS HK$120 MLN 12BP ALL-IN 24
CO-MANAGERS HK$60 MLN 12BP ALL-IN 24
NOTES SENIOR AND UNSECURED DEBT.
CLEARING THROUGH HKMA CENTRAL MONEYMARKETS UNIT.
APPLICATION WILL BE MADE TO THE HONG KONG MONETARY
AUTHORITY TO ACCEPT THE ISSUE AS ELIGIBLE FOR ITS
LIQUIDITY ADJUSTMENT FACILITY, OR DISCOUNT WINDOW.
-- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6960
